parameters.name: Root
parameters.description: Array of doubles defining the root point

parameters.name: Normal
parameters.description: Array of doubles defining the direction vector

title: IFace2.IGetSilhoutteEdgeCount
description: Gets the number of silhouette edges for this face.
signature:
System.Int32 IGetSilhoutteEdgeCount( 
   ref System.Double
Root
,
   ref System.Double
Normal
)

parameters.name: Root
parameters.description: Array of doubles defining the root point

parameters.name: Normal
parameters.description: Array of doubles defining the direction vector

remarks:
This method calculates the number of edges returned by
IFace2::IGetSilhoutteEdges
for a given vector root point (root) and a vector direction (normal). Call this method before calling IFace2::IGetSilhoutte.
